title: Shoutout to Pizza Supreme for the awesome customer support!
body:
My account was compromised after 10 years, and subsequently banned for the use of third-party programs after being used by the culprit.
Sent through a ticket and it was quickly resolved by Riot to unban the account and restore access for me. Just wanting to give props to Pizza Supreme (hopefully they see this) from the Riot Support Team for a job well done!
